mapper.update:
update EB_BRAND
BRAND_NAME = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRAND_DESC = #{brandDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMGS = #{imgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRAND_SORT = #{brandSort,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update EB_BRAND set BRAND_NAME = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRAND_DESC = #{brandDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMGS = #{imgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEBSITE = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRAND_SORT = #{brandSort,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select * from eb_brand t where t.brand_name = #{brandName}
